alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Henderson; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Freestone, western Henderson, northwestern Anderson and eastern Navarro Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kerens, or 11 miles east of Corsicana, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Fairfield, Malakoff, Tool, Kerens, Trinidad, Angus, Enchanted Oaks, Caney City, Navarro, Fairfield Lake, Lake Halbert, Coon Creek Lake, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Trinidad Lake, Fairfield Lake State Park, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Cross Roads, Payne Springs and Star Harbor. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 198 and 218, and between mile markers 220 and 233. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
